text: Kshatriya is a division of the varna system in Hinduism. A kshatriya is a warrior, ruler, politician, or administrative worker. There are 3 lineages of Kshatriyas:- * Suryavanshi (Solar Dynasty) * Chandravanshi (Lunar Dynasty) * Agnivanshi (Fire Dynasty) * Nagvanshi (Snake Dynasty) However, there is one more lineage (not mentioned in any Puranas) - Nagavanshi (snake-born), who claims descent from the Nagas.
title: Kshatriya
